title: Patching so slow
body:
speed is running 18kbps currently not going above 20 , when i started the patch it was 200+ but then slowly it came down to 15 , 17 .....,.,. 

are u guys having the same problem too?

ps: i tried restarting client but didnt work

replies.body:
A lower internet speed could be due to an issue with your network, or with your ISP.  If you are still experiencing this, you can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities that could be causing a slower speed.  It could also be the rate at which your drive is able to write these updates and files.

Also, I don't recommend doing this until after the patcher is finished.  Closing it out before it's done could cause your patcher to scan files for corruption, which may take a bit.  As long as you're not receiving errors, let it do its thing!  Hopefully, that will help strengthen things up!
